text: niyata vasayenma ahas ha mahapolova mævu dina allahge niyamayehi allah abiyasa masa ganana masa dolosaki. evayin siv masak parisuddhaya. eyayi rju dahama vanuye. ebævin evayehi numbala numbalatama aparadha kara noganu. deva adesakayin numbala samanga siyallehi (siyalu masayanhi) yuda vadinak men numbala da ovun samanga siyallehi yuda vadinu. tavada sæbævinma allah deva biya hængimen yut aya samanga yæyi numbala dæna ganu
